scripts.convex:dev: sh -c 'set -a; [ -f .env.local ] && . ./.env.local; : ${CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_ADMIN_KEY:=$CONVEX_ADMIN_KEY}; : ${CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_URL:=$CONVEX_URL}; export CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_ADMIN_KEY CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_URL; convex dev --url "$CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_URL" --admin-key "$CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_ADMIN_KEY" --typecheck disable --codegen enable'
scripts.convex:dev:once: sh -c 'set -a; [ -f .env.local ] && . ./.env.local; : ${CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_ADMIN_KEY:=$CONVEX_ADMIN_KEY}; : ${CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_URL:=$CONVEX_URL}; export CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_ADMIN_KEY CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_URL; convex dev --once --url "$CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_URL" --admin-key "$CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_ADMIN_KEY" --typecheck disable --codegen enable'
scripts.convex:deploy: sh -c 'set -a; [ -f .env.local ] && . ./.env.local; : ${CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_ADMIN_KEY:=$CONVEX_ADMIN_KEY}; : ${CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_URL:=$CONVEX_URL}; export CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_ADMIN_KEY CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_URL; convex deploy --url "$CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_URL" --admin-key "$CONVEX_SELF_HOSTED_ADMIN_KEY" --typecheck disable --codegen enable'
